allow:
Bash(# Create backup first
cp -r /workspace/data /workspace/data_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)
echo "‚úÖ Backup created"

# Copy projects to your user directory
USER_ID="06f25d7b-1e14-454c-89e5-d742020c10a8"
USER_PROJECTS_DIR="/workspace/data/users/$USER_ID/projects"

# Create projects directory for your user if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p "$USER_PROJECTS_DIR"

# Copy each project
for project_dir in /workspace/data/projects/*/; do
    if [ -d "$project_dir" ]; then
        project_id=$(basename "$project_dir")
        echo "üìÅ Migrating project: $project_id"
        cp -r "$project_dir" "$USER_PROJECTS_DIR/"
    fi
done

echo "‚úÖ Migration completed!")
